獧字的基本解释

獧
juàn
同“狷”。

獧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuān］
［《集韻》隳緣切，平，曉。］
通“儇1”。
(1)聪慧。参见“獧慧”。
(2)轻佻。参见“獧薄”。
(3)狡猾，奸诈。参见“獧黠”。
(4)敏捷。参见“獧給”。
[②]［juàn］
［《廣韻》古縣切，去霰，見。］
通“狷1”。
耿介，正直。

獧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页719第24
【唐韻】古縣切【集韻】扃縣切，?音睊。【說文】疾跳也。【集韻】或作?。　又一曰急也。【孟子】必也狂獧乎。　又【集韻】【韻會】?隳緣切，音翾。【玉篇】跳也，急也。【集韻】疾也。　又【集韻】胡涓切，音懸。犬疾躍也。　又【集韻】古泫切，音畎。本作狷。詳狷字註。

[①]［xuān］
["Ji Yun" 隳Edge cut, flat , Xiao. ]
Same as "儇1".

(2) Frivolous. See "Thinness".
(3) Cunning and treacherous. See "Horse".
(4) Agility. See "狷给".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狷; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 719 24
【Tang Yun】Guxian cut 【Ji Yun】Punxian cut, the sound? [Said the text] Jump quickly. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　Anxiously. [Mencius] must also be arrogant.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Yuan cut, Yinyi. [Jade articles] Jumping is also anxious. 【Jiyun】Illness.　[Jiyun] Hu Juanqie, the sound is hanging. The dog leaps quickly.　[Jiyun] Gu Hyun cut, sound Dian. This is a shame. Detailed note of the word.
